backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend rollback and fix features with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries for all major frontend files, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS layers and OKLCH-based design tokens defining light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file defining the root element and loading main.tsx via Vite.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with hash-based routing, page normalization, and nested error boundaries.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Netlify-compatible contact form with controlled fields and basic submit handling.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeAccent: Renders themed background accent layers based on variant prop.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component providing fallback UI and error logging.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with DREAMONOMY copyright text and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with mobile menu, scroll styling, and hash navigation.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Reusable service card with icon, title, description, and gradient accent.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsConte: Renders structured “Why Choose Us” content sections with headings, paragraphs, and bullet lists based on provided data.
frontend/src/content/dreamonomyCopy.ts: Provides centralized marketing copy and structured content for pages including hero text, why-choose-us data, and service descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored identity restoration using Dfinity’s AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, brand color variables, dark mode styles, and reusable component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutWhyPage.tsx: Builds the About/Why page using dreamonomyCopy content, decorative components, and responsive sections for story and philosophy.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with a hero section, intro text from dreamonomyCopy, and a ContactForm component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the Home page with a hero section, rotating logo, dynamic hero copy, CTA button, and services preview using dreamonomyCopy content.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays the Services page hero and detailed service sections using dreamonomyCopy, with decorative accents and structured content blocks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, goals, constraints, architectural notes, and known issues for updating the DREAMONOMY static site with user-provided content.
